self_predictions.prediction_summary: Daniel feels it's a balanced match, unsure of his current level as he hasn't lost since 2020.
self_predictions.style_conflict: Inside pull expected, Daniel's left arm is dominant but Emil's left is healthy.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Ferit's left is fresher and he's fighting at home, but Wagner's press is dangerous.
Slightly favors Toms based on recent European Championship performance.
Impressed by Petrenko's strength from side table pulls.
Rino is on a roll, Terence's current form unknown.
If Pavlo is in the same shape as against Sabine, he can win.
60-40 Morozov if outside, 50-50 if hook inside.
55-45 Ermes, needs to avoid Jerry's position to win.

Emil Amirshadyan.strength: Close to Daniel's level, left arm healthy.
Emil Amirshadyan.health: Right arm not fully healed, left arm in good condition.
Emil Amirshadyan.previous_match_summary: History of close matches, Emil won in 2018 and 2019, Daniel in 2017.

Artyom Morozov.strength: Young and strong, better if outside.
Artyom Morozov.previous_match_summary: Unpredictable but slightly favored over Georgi.

Jerry Cadorette.strength: Strong press, dangerous if he gets position.

self_predictions.prediction_summary: Emil is not at peak condition but is not afraid and will try everything to win.
self_predictions.style_conflict: Left arm is healthier, expects a tough match.

third_party_predictions.prediction_summary: Expects a hard match based on endurance.
Ermes' triceps and top roll can counter Jerry's press.

Daniel Procopciuc.strength: Strong left arm, no losses since 2020.
Daniel Procopciuc.health: Right arm better than left currently.
Daniel Procopciuc.previous_match_summary: Close history, Daniel won in 2017, Emil in 2018 and 2019.
